subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski had a track-record speed of 188.791 miles per hour in a Ford to win the pole position for Saturday night’s Nascar Sprint Cup race at Kentucky Speedway.
snippet: Brad Keselowski had a track-record speed of 188.791 miles per hour in a Ford to win the pole position for Saturday night’s Nascar Sprint Cup race at Kentucky Speedway.
